title: 2016 R&J Dump Trailer
item_description:
2016 R&J Dump Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 2016
  • Make: R And J Trailers
  • Model: 6x10 Dump
  • VIN: 1R9BD1023GF600017
  • License: 4PW3935
    • Expiration Date: 8/31/2021
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 7,000 Lbs
  • Trailer Type: Dump

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 180.5”
  • Overall Width: 97”
  • Overall Height: 82”
  • Deck Length: 120”
  • Deck Width: 74”
  • Side Height: 53.5”
  • Width Between Fenders: 77”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: None
  • Number of Wheels: 4
  • Tire Size: ST205/75R15
  • Electric Plug Type: 6-Way Round
  • Hitch: 2" Ball
  • Contents of trailer must be removed with trailer 

Note:  No title was ever issued for this trailer. Application for PTI with Transfer, Transfer Form, and Court Order will be mailed once the court order is received. Please allow 2-3 weeks after removal. Thank you for your patience. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
